00019 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00020 
00021 //! Base class for HP/Agilent Network Analyzer.
00022 class XAgilentNetworkAnalyzer : public XCharDeviceDriver<XNetworkAnalyzer>
00023 {
00024     XNODE_OBJECT
00025 protected:
00026     XAgilentNetworkAnalyzer(const char *name, bool runtime,
00027          const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00028          const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00029          const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00030          const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);
00031     virtual ~XAgilentNetworkAnalyzer() {}
00032 
00033     virtual void onStartFreqChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &);
00034     virtual void onStopFreqChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &);
00035     virtual void onAverageChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &);
00036     virtual void onPointsChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &);
00037     virtual void getMarkerPos(unsigned int num, double &x, double &y);
00038     virtual void oneSweep();
00039     virtual void startContSweep();
00040     virtual void acquireTrace(unsigned int ch);
00041     //! convert raw to dispaly-able
00042     virtual void convertRaw() throw (XRecordError&);
00043 
00044     //! Be called just after opening interface. Call start() inside this routine appropriately.
00045     virtual void open() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &);
00046 
00047     virtual void acquireTraceData(unsigned int ch, unsigned int len) = 0;
00048     virtual void convertRawBlock(unsigned int len) throw (XRecordError&) = 0;
00049 private:
00050 };
00051 
00052 //! HP/Agilent 8711C/8712C/8713C/8714C Network Analyzer.
00053 class XHP8711 : public XAgilentNetworkAnalyzer
00054 {
00055     XNODE_OBJECT
00056 protected:
00057     XHP8711(const char *name, bool runtime,
00058          const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00059          const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00060          const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00061          const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00062              XAgilentNetworkAnalyzer(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers) {}
00063     virtual ~XHP8711() {}
00064 
00065     virtual void acquireTraceData(unsigned int ch, unsigned int len);
00066     virtual void convertRawBlock(unsigned int len) throw (XRecordError&);
00067 private:
00068 };
